statements: DELETE FROM game_data WHERE game_id = 101 AND completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM game_data WHERE schedule_date < '2022-01-01' AND home_score > 20;
DELETE FROM Player_Stats WHERE player_name = 'Messi' AND assists > 5
DELETE FROM scores WHERE home_team_score >= 10 AND away_team_score < 5;
DELETE FROM scores WHERE game_id = 102 AND winning_team = 'Team A';
DELETE FROM player_statistics WHERE game_id = 2022 AND points > 20;
